<script>
import axios from 'axios';
export default {

  mounted() {
    var tokenValue = this.$store.state.authData.token;
    console.log(tokenValue);
    if (tokenValue && tokenValue!='null') {
      axios.defaults.headers.common = {
        authorization: t
      }
    }else{
      axios.defaults.headers.common = {};
    }
  },
}
</script>
